column5: I had two Misdemenor traffic violations 8 years ago. It looks as though I may need to apply for a Temporary Resident Permit and pay their $200. I will be flying into Canada, what is the best, quickest way to get the permit ahead of time. I will be leaving in a month. Thanks for your help.

Canbound: I don't know the answer but you may find some assistance through Citizenship and Immigration Canada at: http://www.cic.gc.ca/english/offices/missions.html Contact information is available for offices in Buffalo, Detroit,Los Angeles, New York, Seattle and Washington, D.C.
